articles.title: Foreign Ministry spokesman on Israel's decision for new settlement
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry spokesman on Israel's decision for new settlement
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- "WE EXPRESS DEEP CONCERN 
OVER THE CHALLENGE OF ISRAEL, WHICH HAS LAID A NEW OBSTACLE 
IN THE MID-EAST PEACE PROCESS THE PROSPECT OF WHICH HAD BEEN 
IN SIGHT."
   A SPOKESMAN FOR THE DPRK FOREIGN MINISTRY DECLARED THIS 
TODAY WHEN HE WAS INTERVIEWED BY THE KCNA OVER THE RECENT 
ANNOUNCEMENT THAT THE ISRAELI GOVERNMENT APPROVED THE 
BUILDING OF A NEW SETTLEMENT FOR JEWS IN EAST KUDS.
   THIS DECISION OF ISRAEL IS AIMED AT OCCUPYING EAST KUDS 
INDEFINITELY, THE SPOKESMAN SAID, AND WENT ON:
   ISRAEL SHOULD STOP SUCH AN UNJUSTIFIABLE ACT AS DELAYING 
AND ENDANGERING THE MID-EAST PEACE PROCESS AND PAY ATTENTION 
TO THE JUST DEMAND OF ARABS.
   WE CONSIDER THAT THE MID-EAST ISSUE SHOULD BE SOLVED IN A 
FAIR AND COMPREHENSIVE WAY ON THE BASIS OF "LAND-FOR-PEACE 
PRINCIPLE", AND HOLD THAT THE LEGITIMATE NATIONAL RIGHTS OF 
THE PALESTINIAN PEOPLE INCLUDING THE RIGHT TO ESTABLISHMENT 
OF AN INDEPENDENT STATE SHOULD BE RESTORED AND ISRAEL SHOULD 
WITHDRAW FROM ALL THE ARAB LANDS UNDER ITS OCCUPATION.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's camping starts
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's camping starts
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- SCHOOLCHILDREN'S CAMPING FOR 
THIS YEAR HAS STARTED AT CAMPS ACROSS THE COUNTRY.
   PUPILS FROM SCHOOLS THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY ARE ENJOYING 
THEMSELVES AT THE CAMPS.
   AT THE MANGYONGDAE SCHOOLCHILDREN'S CAMP LOCATED AT THE 
FOOT OF MT. RYONGAK ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF PYONGYANG, HUNDREDS 
OF CAMPERS ARE NOW BUILDING UP THEIR PHYSICAL STRENGTH AND 
ENRICHING THEIR KNOWLEDGE THROUGH MOUNTAINEERING, SPORTS AND 
ART ACTIVITIES. IN PARTICULAR, MARCH ON SNOWY ROADS AND 
MOUNTAINEERING ARE VERY GOOD FOR FOSTERING THE SENSE OF 
ORGANIZATION AND DISCIPLINE AND THE SPIRIT OF OVERCOMING 
DIFFICULTIES AMONG THE CAMPERS.
   AT THIS CAMP WITH A TOTAL FLOOR SPACE OF 15,000 SQUARE 
METRES THERE ARE THREE SIX-STORYED HOUSES, A DINING HALL 
WHICH CAN ACCOMMODATE 500 CAMPERS AT ONCE, AND A 600-SEAT 
THEATRE. IT ALSO HAS UPTODATE FACILITIES NECESSARY FOR 
CAMPING, AMONG THEM CHILDREN'S UNION ROOM, MUSIC AND 
FINE ART ROOMS, AND ROOMS FOR GIVING KNOWLEDGES ABOUT 
MOUNTAINEERING AND OCEANS.
   THE STATE, WHICH HAS REGARDED CHILDREN AS KING OF THE 
COUNTRY, HAD SCHOOLCHILDREN'S CAMPS BUILT IN SUCH SCENIC 
SPOTS AS SONGDOWON, MTS. MYOHYANG AND JANGJA, SOKAM, SOKHU 
AND SOHO AND HAS PROVIDED CAMPERS WITH ALL CONDITIONS NEEDED 
FOR THEIR CAMPING. 
   HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF SCHOOLCHILDREN ENJOY CAMPING 
EVERY YEAR AT STATE EXPENSE AND, THROUGH IT, TRAIN 
THEMSELVES TO BE RESERVES FOR THE REVOLUTION WHO ARE 
KNOWLEDGEABLE, MORAL AND HEALTHY.

articles.title: Review of Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Review of Rodong Sinmun
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- RODONG SINMUN TODAY 
FRONTPAGES A REPORT THAT SECRETARY KIM JONG IL SENT THANKS TO 
OFFICIALS OF THE MINISTRY OF MARINE TRANSPORT FOR 
DISTINGUISHING THEMSELVES IN AFFORESTING THE AREA AROUND 
KUMSUSAN MEMORIAL PALACE, ASSISTING THE PEOPLE'S ARMY AND 
HELPING THE WONSAN-KUMGANGSAN RAILWAY CONSTRUCTION.
   THE PAPER CARRIES ACCOUNTS OF CELEBRATIONS IN DIFFERENT 
COUNTRIES ON THE OCCASION OF THE 55TH BIRTHDAY OF SECRETARY
KIM JONG IL UNDER THE BANNERLINE TITLE "PRESENT HISTORY OF 
POLITICS RECORDS HIS EXCELLENCY KIM JONG IL AS A VETERAN 
STATESMAN".
   ECONEWS OF THE PAPER INCLUDES NEWS THAT WORKING PEOPLE IN 
DIFFERENT DOMAINS OF THE NATIONAL ECONOMY ARE CONTINUOUSLY 
EFFECTING INNOVATIONS AFTER FULFILLING THEIR PLANS IN 
FEBRUARY AND RURAL VILLAGES ACROSS THE COUNTRY ARE STEPPING 
UP PREPARATIONS FOR SEEDING.
   IT RUNS AN ARTICLE TITLED "SOCIALISM IS THE LIFE AND SOUL 
OF OUR PEOPLE".
   IT INTRODUCES BEAUTIFUL TRAITS OF ARMY-PEOPLE UNITY IN 
FULL PLAY IN KOREA.
   APPEARING IN THE PAPER IS A STATEMENT OF A SPOKESMAN OF 
THE CENTRAL COMMITTEE OF THE KOREAN JOURNALISTS UNION 
DENOUNCING  KIM YOUNG SAM FOR DEFENDING HIMSELF IN A RECENT 
"STATEMENT TO THE PEOPLE" IN A BID TO AVOID THE RESPONSIBILITY
FOR THE CRITICAL SITUATION OF SOUTH KOREA. 
   IT STRESSES IN A COMMENTARY THAT THE TIME-LIMIT STRIKE 
STAGED BY "KOREAN CONFEDERATION OF TRADE UNIONS" AND OTHER 
TRADE UNIONS AND WORKERS IN SOUTH KOREA IS QUITE NATURAL AND 
JUST.  THE KIM YOUNG SAM GROUP'S ORDER TO WATCH MOVEMENTS OF 
OFFENDERS OF THE "NATIONAL SECURITY LAW" IS A FASCIST 
DOUBLE STRANGULATION, THE PAPER NOTES IN A COMMENTARY.
   RODONG SINMUN SAYS IN AN ARTICLE THAT  KIM YOUNG SAM CANNOT
AVOID THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE HANBO INCIDENT.

articles.title: Colombian President favors Korea's reunification
articles.content:
Colombian President favors Korea's reunification 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- THE GOVERNMENT AND PEOPLE OF 
COLOMBIA WILL SUPPORT THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S EFFORTS FOR THE 
PEACEFUL REUNIFICATION OF THE COUNTRY.
   COLOMBIAN PRESIDENT ERNESTO SAMPER PIZANO DECLARED THIS 
ON FEB. 13 WHEN HE RECEIVED CREDENTIALS FROM THE NEWLY-
APPOINTED DPRK AMBASSADOR, RI IN CHUN.
   HE SAID COLOMBIA, CHAIR-STATE OF THE NON-ALIGNED 
MOVEMENT, WILL ENCOURAGE THE KOREAN GOVERNMENT'S POSITION 
FOR NATIONAL REUNIFICATION IN THE MOVEMENT.
   AND HE MENTIONED THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE FRIENDLY 
RELATIONS BETWEEN THE TWO COUNTRIES.

articles.title: S. Korean economy on verge of total bankruptcy
articles.content:
S. Korean economy on verge of total bankruptcy 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- KIM YOUNG SAM OF SOUTH KOREA 
SAID, IN A "STATEMENT TO THE PEOPLE" WHICH WAS ISSUED ON 
FEB. 25 FOUR YEARS AFTER HIS ASSUMPTION OF OFFICE, THAT HE 
WOULD "CONCENTRATE ALL EFFORTS ON SAVING THE ECONOMY" IN A 
YEAR TO COME.
   HOWEVER, PEOPLE IN SOUTH KOREA ARE SCEPTICAL ABOUT HIS 
STATEMENT BECAUSE HE HAS MESSED UP THE ECONOMY SINCE HIS 
ASSUMPTION OF OFFICE. IT IS BORNE OUT BY FOLLOWING FIGURES:
   - 23,700 MILLION DOLLARS OF TRADE DEFICIT
   S. KOREA'S TRADE DEFICIT IN 1993, THE FIRST YEAR OF 
KIM YOUNG SAM'S OFFICE, WAS 1,560 MILLION DOLLARS. BUT THE 
RED INK IN 1996 SOARED TO 23,700 MILLION, OR MORE THAN 15 
TIMES 1993'S FIGURE.
   THE DEFICIT HAS BEEN ON A RADICAL RISE THIS YEAR, 
REGISTERING 3,500 MILLION DOLLARS IN JANUARY ALONE. IF THIS 
CONTINUES TO BE THE CASE, IT WILL REACH A RECORD HIGH, 
42,000 MILLION DOLLARS AT THE END OF THE YEAR.
   SOUTH KOREA'S IS A COLONIAL EXPORT-ORIENTED ECONOMY, A 
DEPENDENT AND CRIPPLED ECONOMY.
   - 110 BILLION DOLLARS OF FOREIGN DEBT
   SOUTH KOREA'S FOREIGN DEBT IN 1992 WAS 42,800 MILLION 
DOLLARS.
   THE DEBT HAS WIDENED TO 110 BILLION DOLLARS, NEARLY THREE 
TIMES THE FIGURE, IN FOUR YEARS AFTER KIM CAME TO POWER.
   WHEN HE TOOK OFFICE, HE PROMISED TO "REVIVE 
THE ECONOMY" TO BE CALLED "ECONOMIC PRESIDENT". HOWEVER, HE 
HAS REDUCED SOUTH KOREA TO NO.1 DEBTOR OF THE WORLD.
   - BANKRUPTCY OF 50,000 BUSINESSES 
   KIM PROMISED TO SHAPE A "POLICY OF ATTACHING IMPORTANCE 
TO MINOR BUSINESSES", ADVERTISING "THE ECONOMY FOR PEOPLE." 
FOR THE PURPOSE OF MAKING HIS PROMISE SOUND TRUE, HE SET UP 
THE "AGENCY FOR MINOR BUSINESSES", WHICH WAS A MERE BAUBLE.
   THE NUMBER OF BANKRUPT BUSINESSES IN 1994 WAS 11,200 AS 
AGAINST 9,500 IN 1993. IN 1996, 1,000 BUSINESSES WENT 
BANKRUPT ON A MONTHLY AVERAGE.
   AFTER ALL, ABOVE 50,000 BUSINESSES WENT TO RUIN IN FOUR 
YEARS OF HIS OFFICE.
   THIS YEAR IS LIKELY TO SEE A RADICALLY INCREASING NUMBER 
OF BANKRUPT BUSINESSES DUE TO THE HANBO LOAN SCANDAL.
   SO, POLITICIANS, BUSINESSMEN AND SCHOLARS IN SOUTH KOREA 
ARE NOW CONTENDING THAT "THERE IS NO HOPE FOR THE 
RESTORATION OF THE ECONOMY."
   SOUTH KOREAN PRESS MEDIA DESCRIBE THE ECONOMY AS "THE 
ECONOMY ON THE EDGE OF A PRECIPICE", "THE ECONOMY ON THE 
POINT OF DOWNFALL" AND "DEAD ECONOMY", CONTENDING THAT THE 
TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM HAS DESTROYED IT TOTALLY.

articles.title: Central meeting of Korean residents in Japan held
articles.content:
Central meeting of Korean residents in Japan held

KOREAN RESIDENTS IN JAPAN FOR NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND 
PEACE WAS HELD IN TOKYO ON MARCH 1, THE 78TH ANNIVERSARY OF 
THE MARCH FIRST POPULAR UPRISING.
   SO MAN SUL, VICE-CHAIRMAN OF THE CENTRAL STANDING 
COMMITTEE OF THE GENERAL ASSOCIATION OF KOREAN RESIDENTS IN 
JAPAN (CHONGRYON), SAID IN HIS REPORT THAT THE MARCH FIRST 
POPULAR UPRISING WAS A NATION-WIDE RESISTANCE AGAINST THE 
JAPANESE IMPERIALISTS,  WHO ILLEGALLY OCCUPIED KOREA AND PUT 
IT UNDER A CRUEL COLONIAL RULE, AND FOR NATIONAL 
INDEPENDENCE.
   NOTING THAT NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND PEACE HAVE BEEN 
THREATENED IN THE KOREAN PENINSULA BY THE SOUTH KOREAN 
PUPPET CLIQUE'S POLICY OF DEPENDENCE ON OUTSIDE FORCES AND 
CONFRONTATION WITH THE NORTH, HE BITTERLY CONDEMNED THE 
TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM ON BEHALF OF THE 700,000 KOREAN 
RESIDENTS IN JAPAN.
   THE VICTORY OF THE CAUSE OF NATIONAL REUNIFICATION IS 
INEVITABLE AND DEFINITE FOR THE KOREAN PEOPLE WITH THE MOST

ON ALL THE JAPAN-RESIDENT KOREANS TO EXERT ALL EFFORTS TO 
MAKE THIS "A YEAR OF SOLIDARITY AMONG THE KOREANS IN THE 
NORTH, SOUTH AND OVERSEAS FOR NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND

articles.title: Production goes up
articles.content:
Production goes up 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 3 (KCNA) -- PRODUCTION IS ON THE STEADY 
INCREASE IN VARIOUS DOMAINS OF THE KOREAN NATIONAL ECONOMY.
   THE SUNCHON, ANJU, TOKCHON AND KANGDONG DISTRICT COAL 
MINING COMPLEXES AND OTHER COAL MINES ACROSS THE COUNTRY, 
WHICH OVERFULFILLED THEIR FEBRUARY ASSIGNMENTS, ARE 
EXTRACTING MORE COAL THAN THEIR DAILY QUOTAS IN MARCH.
   THE KOMDOK MINING COMPLEX IS OVERFULFILLING ITS 
PRODUCTION PLAN FROM THE FIRST DAYS OF MARCH. IN FEBRUARY, 
IT PRODUCED OVER 100 MORE TONS OF CONCENTRATED ORE ON A 
DAILY AVERAGE THAN THE JANUARY PLAN.
   THE RYONGSONG ASSOCIATED MACHINERY BUREAU, THE TAEAN 
HEAVY MACHINE COMPLEX AND THE RAKWON MACHINE COMPLEX ARE 
KEEPING A HIGH RATE OF PRODUCTION OF ORDERED EQUIPMENT IN 
MARCH. IN FEBRUARY, THEY CARRIED OUT THEIR PLANS 
RESPECTIVELY AT 102, 103.6 AND 102.2 PERCENT.
   THE UNITED THAECHON HYDROELECTRIC POWER STATION AND WIWON 
POWER STATION ARE THESE DAYS HONORING THEIR DAILY 
ASSIGNMENTS AT ABOVE 130 PERCENT. DAILY ASSIGNMENTS ARE ALSO 
BEING OVERFULFULLED BY THE JAGANG PROVINCIAL UNITED TIMBER 
BUREAU AND THE SOUTH PHYONGAN PROVINCIAL ASSOCIATED TIMBER 
MANAGEMENT BUREAU.
   BESIDES, THE SUNGRI GENERAL MOTOR WORKS, THE ASSOCIATED 
MARINE TRANSPORT BUREAU, THE APRIL 3 GENERAL FACTORY, THE 
MARCH 26 FACTORY, THE RYUWON EXPORT-SHOES FACTORY AND MANY 
OTHER UNITS ARE HONORABLY CARRYING OUT THEIR MARCH 
ASSIGNMENTS IN THE SPIRIT OF OVERFULFILLING THEIR FEBRUARY 
PLANS.
